member.name: N:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask
member.summary: The namespace contains the classes and enumerations that allow you to copy one or more SQL Server logins from one instance of SQL Server to another.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.IfObjectExists
member.summary: Contains values used by the property of the to determine how to handle a transfer when the login exists at the destination.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.IfObjectExists.FailTask
member.summary: Causes the task to fail if the same login exists at the destination.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.IfObjectExists.Overwrite
member.summary: Overwrites the login if the same login exists at the destination.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.IfObjectExists.Skip
member.summary: Skips the transfer of a login if the same login exists at the destination.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.LoginsToTransfer
member.summary: Specifies which logins to transfer.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.LoginsToTransfer.AllLogins
member.summary: Transfer all logins.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.LoginsToTransfer.AllLoginsFromSelectedDatabases
member.summary: Transfer logins that have access to specific databases. The specific logins are found in the .

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.LoginsToTransfer.SelectedLogins
member.summary: Transfer only specific logins. The list is retrieved from the property.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.TransferLoginsTask
member.summary: Provides the members and enumerations that allow you to transfer SQL Server logins from one instance of SQL Server to another.

member.summary: Passes a to a task. This method is called by the runtime and is not used in code.
member.param: The breakpoint manager specific for this task.

member.summary: Initializes the properties associated with the task. This method is called by the runtime and is not used in code.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.TransferLoginsTask.ResumeExecution
member.summary: Resumes execution of the task after pausing. The task or container is resumed by the run-time engine.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.TransferLoginsTask.SuspendExecution
member.summary: Indicates that the executable needs to suspend. This method is called by the run-time engine.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.TransferLoginsTask.CopySids
member.summary: Gets or setsa Boolean indicating whether the security identifiers associated with the logins should be copied to the destination.
member.returns: true if the security identifiers associated with the logins are copied.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.TransferLoginsTask.DatabasesList
member.summary: Gets or sets a StringCollection containing the databases on the source server that contain logins to be copied to the destination server.
member.returns: A StringCollection that lists the databases on the source server that contains the logins to be copied to the destination server.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.TransferLoginsTask.DebugMode
member.summary: Indicates whether a task should check if breakpoints are enabled. This property is set by the run-time engine.
member.returns: true if the task should check if breakpoints are enabled; false if the task can skip checking for breakpoints.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.TransferLoginsTask.DestinationConnection
member.summary: Gets or sets a String containing the name of the SMO connection manager for the destination database.
member.returns: A String that contains the SMO connection manager.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.TransferLoginsTask.ExecutionValue
member.summary: Returns an object containing the number of logins that were transferred.
member.returns: An object that contains the number of logins that were transferred.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.TransferLoginsTask.IfObjectExists
member.summary: Gets or sets a value from the enumeration indicating whether the task should fail, ignore the existing login, or skip the transfer of the login, if a login of the same name exists at the destination.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.TransferLoginsTask.LoginsList
member.summary: Gets or sets a StringCollection that contains the names of the logins to transfer.
member.returns: A StringCollection that contains the names of the logins to transfer.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.TransferLoginsTask.LoginsToTransfer
member.summary: Gets or sets a value from the enumeration indicating which logins to transfer.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.TransferLoginsTask.SourceConnection
member.summary: Gets or sets a String containing the name of the SMO connection manager for the source database.
member.returns: A String that contains the connection string of the SMO connection manager.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.TransferLoginsTask.SuspendRequired
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean indicating whether a task should suspend when it encounters a breakpoint. This value is set by the run-time engine for the tasks and containers when a breakpoint is encountered
member.returns: true if the task suspends when it encounters a breakpoint.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.TransferLoginsTask.TransferLoginsTask.DtsTransferLoginsException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown at load time if the persisted name of the XML root node of the task is corrupt.
